title: DO-00-032: Office of Legal Counsel Memorandum Concerning Application of 18 U.S.C. § 209 to Receipt of Outside Royalty Payments by Employee-Inventors
summary: OLC concluded that 18 U.S.C. § 209 ordinarily does not preclude outside royalty payments to employee-inventors who privately commercialize inventions for which the Government has permitted them to obtain patent rights.
